incidents.name: SMS Delivery Delays To Telenor Network In Pakistan

incident_updates.body: We continue to experience delays in SMS delivery to the Telenor network in Pakistan. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 24 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Iraq SMS Carrier Maintenance - Multiple Carrier

incident_updates.body:
Multiple networks in Iraq is conducting a series of planned maintenances from 21 June 2024 at 20:00 PDT until 02 July 2024 at 22:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to Multiple Carrier Iraq handsets.

Note, the maintenance will be carried out on each of the following dates and times:

21 June 2024 at 20:00 PDT until 21 June 2024 at 22:00 PDT
22 June 2024 at 20:00 PDT until 22 June 2024 at 22:00 PDT
23 June 2024 at 20:00 PDT until 23 June 2024 at 22:00 PDT
24 June 2024 at 20:00 PDT until 24 June 2024 at 22:00 PDT
25 June 2024 at 20:00 PDT until 25 June 2024 at 22:00 PDT
26 June 2024 at 20:00 PDT until 26 June 2024 at 22:00 PDT
27 June 2024 at 20:00 PDT until 27 June 2024 at 22:00 PDT
28 June 2024 at 20:00 PDT until 28 June 2024 at 22:00 PDT
29 June 2024 at 20:00 PDT until 29 June 2024 at 22:00 PDT
30 June 2024 at 20:00 PDT until 30 June 2024 at 22:00 PDT
01 July 2024 at 20:00 PDT until 01 July 2024 at 22:00 PDT
02 July 2024 at 20:00 PDT until 02 July 2024 at 22:00 PDT

scheduled_maintenances.name: Italy Account Security Carrier Partner Maintenance - Wind Tre

incident_updates.body:
Our carrier partner Wind Tre Italy is conducting a planned maintenance from 22 June 2024 at 14:00 PDT until 22 June 2024 at 20:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent API request failures for Wind Tre Italy customers.

Impacted Products: Verify Silent Network Auth, Lookup SIM Swap, Lookup Identity Match, Legacy Identity MatchAndAttributes

scheduled_maintenances.name: US SMS Carrier Maintenance - Small US Carriers

incident_updates.body: Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.
Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.

A subset of small networks in the US are conducting a series of planned maintenances from 11 June 2024 at 02:00 PDT until 25 June 2024 at 04:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from small US carriers handsets.

Note, the maintenance will be carried out on each of the following dates and times:

11 June 2024 at 02:00 PDT until 11 June 2024 at 04:00 PDT
18 June 2024 at 02:00 PDT until 18 June 2024 at 04:00 PDT
20 June 2024 at 01:00 PDT until 20 June 2024 at 05:00 PDT
25 June 2024 at 02:00 PDT until 25 June 2024 at 04:00 PDT
